mapper.sql: id, `name`, zh_name, en_name, `desc`, email, `password`, age, mobile, `status`, telephone, short_phone, employee_id, creater, modifier, modify_time, create_time

insert into sys_user

`name`,
zh_name,
en_name,

email,
`password`,
age,
mobile,
`status`,
telephone,
short_phone,

mapper.update:
update sys_user
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zh_name = #{zhName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=BIGINT},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=BIGINT},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
short_phone = #{shortPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
